I've done some hard thinking the past 24 hours about my last post about name calling and hate. I have even discussed this issue with my clergy.
 
 I'm a pretty sensitive person and sometimes I can buy into the hate messages a little too much. As my clergy pointed out, how do I know that some of the people who have been spewing their hate out on this gay rights forum aren't some twisted, sick person already in jail for some hate crime or diagnosed with some antisocial problem or even worse, have an antisocial problem and not do anything to have it diagnosed or fixed? His message was that one can never truely know whom we are exchanging ideas with on the internet. He also said that those people who spread their hate, were not interested in an intelligent, friendly debate, but to spread their hate even more because that may be the only thing that they have left to give and to pray for them. It made a lot of sense, but I'm still a senstive person so...
 
 I'll be around posting in other forums, but won't be posting in this one. It's really not necessary to defend who G*d made me. I don't have to prove others are wrong...opinions can't be wrong or right, they are just opinions.
 
 I'm leaving this forum because I need to be in a more supportive place right now.
 
 To all of you who support gay rights, I appreciate the support. I know there are a lot more of you out there...more than there are people that hate (thank G*d).
 
 Anyway, the best of luck to everyone, G*d bless you all.

post_info.post_title: Not a debate thread but a goodbye...

It's always sad to see someone leave because of the insensitivity of others, Ladywolf.
 
 I hope you find a more enjoyable atmosphere at your new location.
 
 I enjoyed your posts and can see no fault in you at all. You’ve not offended anyone in any manner that I know of, only to object in some instances, which was all within any bounds of debate.
 
 At anytime you wish to come visit, I’ll welcome you.
 
 God bless you and yours.
I don't know who you are because I'm new here, but I have read some of your posts and I personally think its sad to see you go. Especially over the indecency and disrespect of others.
as my pappy used to say"non-carburumdom illigitamus", or dont let the basterds get you down.

It's sad to see you go, Ladywolf. I've enjoyed your posts here a lot, and I've learned much from those posts. However, I do understand why you had to go, and I don't respect you any less for your decision.
 
 Don't let them get to you. Remember, living well is the best revenge.

I've always found your posts to be reasonably stated. I also hope you'll stay around at least at the other forums. I, myself don't intend to post in this forum much.
 
 But I hope you'll try to realize that the perception of hate may depend on which side you're on. Not here necessarily, but out in the big world, I see in - your - face arrogance and yes, some hate, coming from the gay community. It is a two way street.

I've done some hard thinking the past 24 hours about my last post about name calling and hate. I have even discussed this issue with my clergy.
 
 I'm a pretty sensitive person and sometimes I can buy into the hate messages a little too much. As my clergy pointed out, how do I know that some of the people who have been spewing their hate out on this gay rights forum aren't some twisted, sick person already in jail for some hate crime or diagnosed with some antisocial problem or even worse, have an antisocial problem and not do anything to have it diagnosed or fixed? His message was that one can never truely know whom we are exchanging ideas with on the internet. He also said that those people who spread their hate, were not interested in an intelligent, friendly debate, but to spread their hate even more because that may be the only thing that they have left to give and to pray for them. It made a lot of sense, but I'm still a senstive person so...
 
 I'll be around posting in other forums, but won't be posting in this one. It's really not necessary to defend who G*d made me. I don't have to prove others are wrong...opinions can't be wrong or right, they are just opinions.
 
 I'm leaving this forum because I need to be in a more supportive place right now.
 
 To all of you who support gay rights, I appreciate the support. I know there are a lot more of you out there...more than there are people that hate (thank G*d).
 
 Anyway, the best of luck to everyone, G*d bless you all.

 
 Ladywolf I'm sorry to see you leave because of others actions. I do think though that sometiems people mistake disagreements as hate when it's just a difference of opinion.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Not a debate thread but a goodbye...
